content: Shared folders will be imported into the Rooms section as rooms with users who were granted access. Please note: some access rights may get lost during import

comment.text: Shared folders will be imported into the Rooms section as rooms with users who were granted access. Some access rights may get lost during import. This message appears in the Import Shared Folders settings section, informing users about the process of importing shared folders and potential loss of access rights.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Zəhmət olmasa, nəzərə alın:' is overly formal and doesn't quite fit the tone of the English original. It's a slightly awkward phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Simply use 'Nəzərə alın:' or rephrase to something more natural like 'Xahiş edirik, nəzərə alın:'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'köçürüləcək' (will be moved) isn't the most accurate representation of 'imported'. It implies a simple relocation, whereas 'imported' suggests a process of bringing data into a new system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a term like 'idxal ediləcək' (will be imported) or 'əldə ediləcək' (will be obtained/added) to more accurately convey the meaning of 'imported'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "входирани" (vhodini) is not the best translation for "imported". It's more akin to 'brought in' or 'entered' and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of importing data.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Споделените папки ще бъдат импортирани в секцията Стаи като стаи с потребители, на които е предоставен достъп. Моля, обърнете внимание: някои права за достъп може да се загубят по време на импортирането.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'some access rights may get lost' is translated as 'Jotkin käyttöoikeudet saattavat hävitä'. While technically correct, 'saattavat hävitä' implies a higher probability of loss than the original English phrasing ('may get lost'). A more accurate translation would convey the potential for loss without implying certainty.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jotkin käyttöoikeudet voivat kadota tuonnin aikana

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Համօգտագործվող թղթապանակները" (hamogtavorvogh tghtapanakner) translates more accurately to 'shared folders' but sounds slightly awkward. A more natural Armenian phrasing might be "բաժանված թղթապանակները" (bajanvad tghtapanakner) or simply 'բաժանված պանակները' (bajanvad panakner) which sounds more conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: բաժանված թղթապանակները

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'users who were granted access' is a bit literal. While technically correct, it can be improved for flow.  A more idiomatic translation would be closer to 'օգտվողներ, ունեցող մուտքի իրավունք' (ogtvor, unecogh mut'gi iravunk).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: օգտվողներ, ունեցող մուտքի իրավունք

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'some access rights may get lost' could be more naturally expressed in Armenian as 'մուտքի որոշ իրավունքները կարող են չպահպանվել' (mut'gi qorosh iravunkner karogh en chpahpanvel) which better conveys the meaning of 'not being preserved'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: մուտքի որոշ իրավունքները կարող են չպահպանվել

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "공유된 폴더는 방 섹션에 액세스 권한이 부여된 사용자가 있는 방으로 가져오기됩니다" is a bit convoluted. A more natural and accurate translation would clarify that the shared folders become rooms *containing* the users who had access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 공유된 폴더는 액세스 권한이 부여된 사용자를 포함하는 방으로 방 섹션에 가져오기됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "참고: 가져오기하는 동안 일부 액세스 권한이 손실될 수 있습니다" is grammatically correct but could be more concise and flow better. The term '가져오기하는 동안' is repetitive and slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 참고: 가져오기 과정에서 일부 액세스 권한이 손실될 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ca sălile cu utilizatorii" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "as rooms with users." A more natural phrasing would be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Folderele partajate vor fi importate în secțiunea Săli ca niște săli cu utilizatorii cărora li s-a acordat accesul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of "sălile" makes the sentence slightly clunky. While not technically incorrect, it could be improved for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Folderele partajate vor fi importate în secțiunea Săli, creând săli cu utilizatorii cărora li s-a acordat accesul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "බෙදාගත් බහාලුම්" (bedagath bahaluum) literally translates to 'shared boxes' or 'shared packages'. 'Shared folders' is more accurate.  A better translation would incorporate a word like 'ගොණු' (gonu) which means 'files' or 'documents'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: බෙදාගත් ගොණු (bedagath gonu) ප්‍රවේශය ලබා දී ඇති පරිශ්‍රීලකයින් සමඟ කාමර ලෙස කාමර කොටසට ආයාත කෙරේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්' (pariseelayakayin) for 'users' is a bit formal and unusual. A more common and natural word for 'users' would be 'භාවිතකරන්නන්' (bhavitakaraannnan).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: බෙදාගත් ගොණු ප්‍රවේශය ලබා දී ඇති භාවිතකරන්නන් සමඟ කාමර ලෙස කාමර කොටසට ආයාත කෙරේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'අහිමි වීමට ඉඩ තිබේ' (ahimi vimo id thibe) is a bit verbose for 'may be lost'. A simpler phrasing would improve readability.  Consider 'තියවීමට හැකි' (thiyavetaki).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: බෙදාගත් ගොණු ප්‍රවේශය ලබා දී ඇති භාවිතකරන්නන් සමඟ කාමර ලෙස කාමර කොටසට ආයාත කෙරේ. සටහන: ආයාතය අතරතුර ඇතැම් ප්‍රවේශ අයිතීන් තියවීමට හැකි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Mape v skupni rabi" is a literal translation of "Shared folders" and while technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing in Slovenian. A more idiomatic translation would be something like "Datoteke in mape v skupni rabi" or simply "Datoteke v skupni rabi" if the context makes it clear that both folders and files are included.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Datoteke in mape v skupni rabi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Upoštevajte: med uvozom se lahko nekatere pravice dostopa izgubijo" is grammatically correct, but sounds somewhat formal. A more conversational and approachable translation could be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pozor: med uvozom lahko nekatere pravice dostopa izpadejo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'granted access' is translated as 'којима је дат приступ'. While technically correct, a more natural and idiomatic translation for this context might be 'који су имали приступ' or 'којима је био омогућен приступ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: који су имали приступ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'access rights' is translated as 'права приступа'.  While understandable, a more precise translation in this context would be 'права' or 'права коришћења'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: права

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "granted access" is translated as "kojima je dat pristup". While technically correct, a more natural and common phrasing in Serbian would be "sa korisnicima koji imaju pristup" or "sa korisnicima kojima je omogućen pristup".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Deljeni folderi će biti uvezeni u odeljak Sobe kao sobe sa korisnicima koji imaju pristup.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "some access rights" is translated as "neka prava pristupa". It is better to use a more specific term to convey the nuance of the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Deljeni folderi će biti uvezeni u odeljak Sobe kao sobe sa korisnicima koji imaju pristup. Molimo vas da imate na umu: neki podaci o pravima pristupa mogu biti izgubljeni tokom uvoza.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Rooms section" could be more naturally translated to "Oda’lar bölümü" or "Oda'lar kısmı" for better flow in Turkish.  While "Oda bölümü" is technically correct, it's less common in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Paylaşılan klasörler, erişim hakkı verilen kullanıcıların bulunduğu Oda'lar kısmı olarak Odalar bölümüne aktarılacaktır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'içe aktarma' for 'import' is technically correct, but 'aktarım' or 'yükleme' might be more common and understandable in this context, especially for a broader audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Paylaşılan klasörler, erişim hakkı verilen kullanıcıların bulunduğu Oda'lar kısmı olarak Odalar bölümüne aktarılacaktır. Lütfen dikkat: aktarım sırasında bazı erişim hakları kaybedilebilir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "有被授予访问权限的用户的房间" (yǒu bèi shòu yǔ fǎng wèn quán xiàn de yòng hù de fáng jiān) is a very literal and somewhat awkward translation of "rooms with users who were granted access." It's grammatically correct but sounds unnatural in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would be something like "包含有访问权限用户的房间" (bāo hán yǒu fǎng wèn quán xiàn yòng hù de fáng jiān) or "拥有访问权限用户的房间" (yōng yǒu fǎng wèn quán xiàn yòng hù de fáng jiān).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 改为“包含有访问权限用户的房间”或“拥有访问权限用户的房间”
